attributes.action: Expell all MP’s who have consistently voted against our PM on Brexit
attributes.background: For an MP to vote against our Prime Minister in parliament to take away a No Deal Brexit knowing exactly that by doing so the UK will have no bargaining chip in actually gaining a Deal.Even a primary School child understands by having a No Deal as a bargaining chip is our best way at gaining a Deal

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours and appointments, including sacking MPs or Ministers.
